original_body_lines: Nestlé Nestomalt concluded SALARY for LIFE 2022, powering the ambitions of yet another loyal consumer. Having received a record number of entries, the brand announced Mrs. B. K. Sriyamini Dilini Rodrigo from Pamunugama as the winner of the third leg of its signature consumer promotion, rewarding her with Rs. 50,000 every month until she turns 55, subject to the competition’s terms and conditions.

“As a mother of three, winning last year’s SALARY for LIFE is truly life changing. The past few years have been quite challenging for us, and I have no words to express the gratitude I have for Nestlé Nestomalt for conducting such a worthy competition. This reward will no doubt help me power my family’s ambitions towards a brighter future and make a significant difference in their lives” said Mrs. B. K. Sriyamini Dilini Rodrigo.

Organized for the third consecutive year, SALARY for LIFE 2022 was conducted digitally and required consumers to send via SMS, the unique code printed on the inner top flap of 400g Nestomalt packs to be eligible. The winner was selected at random at a digital draw held with the participation of Ruwan Welikala, Director – Dairy, Nestlé Lanka, Jagath Wedage, Director – Sales, Nestlé Lanka, Keerthi Pathiraja, Assistant Director – Legal, Nestlé Lanka and Ms. Sriyani Napagoda, Senior Tax Officer, Revenue Department, Western Province.
